Gazpacho Soup Recipe
Ingredients
peeled sweet red bell or green
(omit for vegetarian option) (or 1 15-ounce can crushed tomatoes if you don't have tomato juice) Method Place all ingredients in a large bowl. Use an immersion blender or blend in batches, to desired smoothness. We prefer our gazpacho somewhat chunky, so only pulse a few times in the blender. Adjust seasonings to taste. Place in a non-reactive container (tomatoes are acidic) to store. Chill several hours or overnight to allow the flavors to blend.
